main_definition: in a successful or efficient way, achieving the desired result or outcome.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to accomplish something with skill and competence
meanings_and_examples.example: The team effectively completed the project within the given deadline.

meanings_and_examples.definition: in a way that produces the desired result or effect
meanings_and_examples.example: She spoke effectively to convince everyone of her point of view.

meanings_and_examples.definition: with great efficiency and without wasting time or resources
meanings_and_examples.example: The new software implementation will make our work processes more effective by streamlining tasks and reducing errors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to do something in a manner that brings about the intended impact
meanings_and_examples.example: He effectively used humor to diffuse tension during the meeting.
